item.title: [GLAXO] GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals Ltd Appoints Mr. Ronojit Biswas as Whole-Time Director & CFO
item.description:
GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals Ltd has announced the appointment of Mr. Ronojit Biswas as the Whole-Time Director & Chief Financial Officer (CFO) for a term of three years starting from 15th April 2026. Mr. Biswas, who has over 25 years of experience with GSK across international markets, will take over from Mr. Juby Chandy, the current CFO, who will transition into a new role in the GSK Group. Mr. Biswas has previously served as CFO for GSK's Brazil and its Vietnam Businesses, and has completed a Post Graduate Program in Management (Finance) from the Management Development Institute, Gurgaon.

  • Mr. Ronojit Biswas appointed as Whole-Time Director & CFO of GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals Ltd for a term of three years starting from 15th April 2026.
  • Mr. Biswas has over 25 years of experience with GSK across international markets.
  • Mr. Juby Chandy, the current CFO, will transition into a new role in the GSK Group.
  • Mr. Biswas has previously served as CFO for GSK's Brazil and its Vietnam Businesses.
  • Mr. Biswas has completed a Post Graduate Program in Management (Finance) from the Management Development Institute, Gurgaon.

item.title: [PICCADIL] Piccadily Agro Industries to Approve Allotment of Equity Shares to Eligible Employees
item.description:

item.title: [SURAKSHA] Suraksha Diagnostic Ltd Announces Resignation of Group Chief Financial Officer (CFO) Mr. K S Ravindra
item.description:
Suraksha Diagnostic Ltd has announced the resignation of its Group Chief Financial Officer (CFO), Mr. K S Ravindra, who is designated as Key Managerial Personnel (KMP) of the Company. Mr. Ravindra tendered his resignation on 02 March 2026, citing personal reasons. His last working day with the Company will be on or before 31 May 2026. The Company has expressed its appreciation for Mr. Ravindra's services and his contributions during his tenure.

  • Suraksha Diagnostic Ltd announces the resignation of its Group Chief Financial Officer (CFO), Mr. K S Ravindra.
  • Mr. Ravindra tendered his resignation on 02 March 2026 due to personal reasons.
  • His last working day with the Company will be on or before 31 May 2026.
  • The Company has expressed its appreciation for Mr. Ravindra's services and his contributions.
  • The resignation has been made in compliance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

item.title: [EDELWEISS] Edelweiss Financial Services Limited Announces 33,500 Million Public Issue of Secured Redeemable Non-Convertible Debentures
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Edelweiss Financial Services Limited (EFSL) announced the public issue of Secured Redeemable Non-Convertible Debentures (NCDs) of the face value of 21,000 each for an amount up to 1,750 million with a green shoe option of up to 1,750 million, cumulatively aggregating up to 33,500 million. The Issue has 10 series of NCDs carrying fixed coupons and having a tenure of 24 months, 36 months, 60 months, and 120 months with annual, monthly and cumulative interest options. The effective annual interest yield on the NCDs ranges from 8.64% p.a. to 10.01% p.a. The Issue is scheduled to open on March 2, 2026 and will close on March 16, 2026. At least 75% of the funds raised through this Issue will be used for the purpose of repayment/prepayment of interest and principal of existing borrowings of the Company and the balance is proposed to be utilised for general corporate purposes.

  • Edelweiss Financial Services Limited announces a public issue of Secured Redeemable Non-Convertible Debentures (NCDs) worth up to 33,500 million
  • The NCDs have a fixed coupon rate and varying tenures from 24 months to 120 months
  • The effective annual interest yield on the NCDs ranges from 8.64% p.a. to 10.01% p.a.
  • The Issue will open on March 2, 2026 and close on March 16, 2026
  • At least 75% of the funds raised will be used for repayment/prepayment of existing borrowings

item.title: [MAYURUNIQ] Mayur Uniquoters Ltd. Appoints Mrs. Puja Poddar as President- HR and Administration and SMP
item.description:
Mayur Uniquoters Ltd. has approved the appointment of Mrs. Puja Poddar as President- HR and Administration and Senior Management Personnel (SMP) of the Company. The appointment was made during the Board of Directors meeting held on March 02, 2026 through Video Conferencing (VC)/Other Audio Visual Means (OAVM). Mrs. Puja Poddar has around five years of work experience in Mayur Uniquoters Limited and has expertise in formulating premium grade materials aligned with international quality standards and specifications. She has represented the organization at international levels including technical engagements with globally known companies like Mercedes Benz. Her academic qualification is Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) from Sydenham College of Commerce & Economics, Mumbai. She is also a Certified Health Coach from the Institute for Integrative Nutrition (IIN), New York, USA and an Access Consciousness (USA) Practioner.

  • Mrs. Puja Poddar appointed as President- HR and Administration and SMP of Mayur Uniquoters Ltd.
  • Mrs. Poddar has around five years of work experience in Mayur Uniquoters Limited.
  • She has expertise in formulating premium grade materials aligned with international quality standards and specifications.
  • Mrs. Poddar has represented the organization at international levels including technical engagements with globally known companies like Mercedes Benz.
  • Mrs. Poddar is a Certified Health Coach from the Institute for Integrative Nutrition (IIN), New York, USA and an Access Consciousness (USA) Practioner.

item.title: [ATULAUTO] Atul Auto Ltd. Reports 14.2% YoY Increase in Total Sales for February 2026
item.description:
Atul Auto Ltd. has reported its sales performance for the month of February 2026. The company's total sales for the month stood at 3,429 units, representing a 14.2% year-over-year increase from 2,900 units in February 2025. The domestic sales saw a growth of 7.79% YoY, while exports increased by 20.72%. The 3W - IC Engine segment showed a significant increase of 26.96%, while the EV segment saw a decline of 10.97% and 58.24% for the L5 category.

  • Atul Auto Ltd. reports a 14.2% YoY increase in total sales for February 2026
  • Domestic sales grow by 7.79% YoY
  • Exports increase by 20.72% YoY
  • 3W - IC Engine sales surge by 26.96%
  • EV segment experiences a decline of 10.97% and 58.24% for the L5 category
